mapper.sql: id, contacts_details_id, customer_details_id, opportunity_theme, update_date, customer_name, `state`, contacts_name, sales_type, find_date, `source`, real_name, provider, customer_demand, signing_date, possibility, estimated_amount, stage, stage_remarks, stay_phase
mapper.select:
select
from ix_details
and `state` like concat(concat('%',#{state}),'%')
and opportunity_theme like concat(concat('%',#{opportunityTheme}),'%')
and CONCAT(IFNULL(id,''),IFNULL(opportunity_theme,''),IFNULL(customer_name,''),IFNULL(sales_type),'') LIKE "%"#{keyword}"%"
